main.name: Nik N
main.description: I'm a full stack developer. I focus on MERN stack, Laravel/Vue.js,... I'm also familiar with Cryptocurrency such as Chatapp, Bitcoin, Ethereum...
main.bio: As a web developer, I've rich experience in building several websites using React.js, Vue.js and Laravel framework. I'm interested in blockchain technology and applications using this technology such as blockchain website.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Nik.N must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
